# Spookfinder

> A directory of America's most haunted places

Spookfinder is a curated database of haunted locations across the United States. Each entry includes the location's history, documented ghost stories, and visitor information.

## Quick Facts

- 752 haunted locations
- 18 US states covered
- Categories: hotels, restaurants, cemeteries, hospitals, theaters, museums, and more

## States Covered

California, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia

## How to Navigate

- Browse by state: https://spookfinder.com/states/{state-name}
- View a location: https://spookfinder.com/place/{slug}
- API access: https://spookfinder.com/api/places

## Example State URLs

- https://spookfinder.com/states/california
- https://spookfinder.com/states/texas
- https://spookfinder.com/states/new-york
- https://spookfinder.com/states/louisiana

## API

The JSON API returns location data including:
- Name, city, state, address
- Category (hotel, cemetery, hospital, etc.)
- Historical description
- Ghost stories and paranormal accounts
- GPS coordinates
- Source URLs

```
GET /api/places - All locations (paginated)
GET /api/places?state=CA - Filter by state
GET /api/places/{slug} - Single location
```

## Full Content

For complete location data including all descriptions and ghost stories, see:
https://spookfinder.com/llms-full.txt

## About

Spookfinder researches and documents haunted locations with verified historical accounts, documented paranormal activity, and visitor accessibility. Each location includes source citations.

## Contact

Website: https://spookfinder.com
